title: Can't Check Others' Honor Levels
body: When I view my friends' profiles, I can't see what their honor levels are. I also can't see the honor levels of people who aren't my friends but that I recently played with. Is this intended?

replies.body: For now, this is intended. We wouldn't want people flaming others for having a lower honor level. We're tossing around some ideas on making certain honor levels viewable though!

Wouldnt the person with the low honor likely be the person to flame. High honor players are probably not toxic hence how they likely achieved that honor level.  Also making honor levels visible to other players would likely decrease the amount of toxicity because players wouldnt want to been seen with a very low honor suggesting they may be toxic.  IMO visible honors will influence more players to be less toxic and work harder to be a good sports man and  earn that honor. It just seems weird to hide honor levels cause your worried about higher honor players flaming lower honor players, it almost defeats the purpose of the system as its suppose to reward sportsmanlike/non toxic players, so why would you be worried about these people flaming.  If they flame they put themselves at risk of getting reported at least if it happens in game.
If only there were more people with this level of logic in the world ...

>
> For now, this is intended. We wouldn't want people flaming others for having a lower honor level. We're tossing around some ideas on making certain honor levels viewable though!

I don't think there is really reason to wory about flame connected to honor level. There is no (or almost no) flame with ranked level so i wouldn't expect it with something far less important as honor. And it's a nice thing to compete between friends. May be make it visible for clan members only? 
Anyway its up to you.
Or make it visible for friends at least.

wouldn't it be better to not show an empty space in the profile then, when looking at another person's profile. I don't know, but for me it looks kinda weird to see the empty space on the left (with the grey honor symbol) and I'd rather see the old profile style for other players then
You would think that honorable players wouldn't be toxic toward others... Right? So, the decision to make it not visible makes no sense at all.
Why don't you make it so that friends can see each others honor rank, it would be kinda cool to have some bragging rights.  It is not like you flame friends unironically.
